directions: Put the apple, cabbage, garlic, chile, spring onion, and cilantro in a medium bowl. Pour over the vinegar, season with salt and pepper, and toss to combine.
ingredients: 1 red chile, finely chopped (keep the seeds if you like it hot)
1 1/4 cups (300 ml) white wine vinegar or apple cider vinegar
title: Apple Slaw
